name: The Incredible Story of Pizza (prototype version)
name_original: The Incredible Story of Pizza (prototype version)
description:
The Incredible Story of Pizza is a randomly generated open-world sandbox where you spread the magic of pizza. Build your pizzeria and deliver pizzas to the inhabitants of the island. Inspired by the Lego Island series.

This game was made in Unreal Engine 4 for the Awful Winter Jam 2018

If you have any suggestions you are welcome to tell me in the discussion board.
